name: MuX
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 or later, 64 bit Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better)
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows™ 7 or later, 64 bit Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better.
